## Music Service Integrations

**Phase:** Phase 5 - Advanced Integration & Ecosystem
**Timeline:** 6-8 weeks
**Section:** 5.1

### Goal
Expand integration ecosystem and platform capabilities

### Impact
Expands compatible music sources

### Effort Estimate
3 weeks

### Priority
P2

### Tasks

- [ ] Add Plex integration (alternative to Navidrome)
- [ ] Support Jellyfin music libraries
- [ ] Implement Airsonic compatibility
- [ ] Add local folder scanning (no server required)
- [ ] Create import tools for Spotify/Apple Music playlists
- [ ] Add Last.fm scrobbling integration

### Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] All tasks completed
- [ ] Code reviewed and approved
- [ ] Tests passing (unit + integration)
- [ ] Documentation updated
- [ ] No regressions in existing functionality
